What is the vacation policy?.content: Policy: Vacation Policy | Type: Vacation | Department: HR | Priority: Low | Content: Employees are entitled to paid vacation time based on their length of service. New employees receive 10 days annually, increasing to 15 days after 2 years and 20 days after 5 years. Vacation requests must be submitted at least 2 weeks in advance and approved by the direct manager.

Policy: Sick Leave Policy | Type: Sick Leave | Department: Operations | Priority: Low | Content: All employees are provided with sick leave benefits. Full-time employees accrue 8 hours of sick leave per month. Sick leave can be used for personal illness, medical appointments, or caring for immediate family members. A doctor's note may be required for absences exceeding 3 consecutive days.
Document: Time Off Request Form | Type: Form | Department: HR | Content: Time Off Request Form - Use this form to request vacation, sick leave, or personal time off.

How do I submit a timesheet?.content: Document: Time Off Request Form | Type: Form | Department: HR | Content: Time Off Request Form - Use this form to request vacation, sick leave, or personal time off.
Document: Expense Reimbursement Form | Type: Form | Department: Sales | Content: Expense Reimbursement Form - Submit business expenses for reimbursement using this form.
Document: Training Request Form | Type: Form | Department: Operations | Content: Training Request Form - Request approval for external training or conference attendance.

Who is the HR manager for engineering?.content: Document: Manager's Handbook | Type: Guide | Department: All | Content: Manager's Handbook - Comprehensive guide for managers covering hiring, performance management, and employee relations.
Document: Policy Document 18 | Type: Policy | Department: Engineering | Content: This is a policy document containing important HR information and procedures.
Document: Policy Document 15 | Type: Policy | Department: Engineering | Content: This is a policy document containing important HR information and procedures.

What are the health insurance benefits?.content: Policy: Benefits Policy | Type: Benefits | Department: Finance | Priority: High | Content: The company provides comprehensive benefits including health insurance, dental, vision, 401(k) with company matching, life insurance, and disability coverage. Benefits enrollment occurs during the annual open enrollment period or within 30 days of hire. Contact HR for detailed benefit information.

Policy: Sick Leave Policy | Type: Sick Leave | Department: Operations | Priority: Low | Content: All employees are provided with sick leave benefits. Full-time employees accrue 8 hours of sick leave per month. Sick leave can be used for personal illness, medical appointments, or caring for immediate family members. A doctor's note may be required for absences exceeding 3 consecutive days.

Policy: Compensation Policy | Type: Compensation | Department: HR | Priority: High | Content: Compensation is based on job responsibilities, performance, market rates, and internal equity. Salary reviews occur annually as part of the performance evaluation process. The company maintains a merit-based pay philosophy with opportunities for advancement.
